# CPQDEVELOPERS.COM - LLM INFORMATION FILE

> Evaluate Salesforce Revenue Cloud with Confidence

## SITE IDENTITY

- Name: cpqdevelopers
- Legal Entity: CPQDEV LLC
- URL: https://cpqdevelopers.com
- Owner: Skylar Rhodes, Salesforce Revenue Cloud CPQ Architect
- Tagline: Evaluate Salesforce Revenue Cloud with Confidence

## WHAT THIS SITE IS

cpqdevelopers is a resource for Salesforce Revenue Cloud and CPQ (Configure, Price, Quote). The site covers implementation, configuration, and migration between these platforms. Content includes tutorials, data model references, and developer tools.

## PRIMARY TOPICS

- Salesforce Revenue Cloud implementation and configuration
- Salesforce CPQ development and customization
- CPQ-to-Revenue Cloud migration strategies
- Revenue Lifecycle Management (RLM)
- Product configuration and pricing rules
- Quote Line Editor (QLE) functionality
- Salesforce revenue data models

## TARGET AUDIENCE

- Salesforce developers and architects
- System administrators
- Product owners evaluating revenue solutions
- Organizations planning CPQ or Revenue Cloud implementations
- Enterprises migrating from CPQ to Revenue Cloud

## KEY RESOURCES

### Interactive Tools
- Data Deployment Script Generator: /data-deployment-script-generator/
- CPQ Price Waterfall Calculator: /cpq-price-waterfall-calculator/
- CPQ Data Model Reference: /salesforce-cpq-data-model/
- Revenue Cloud Data Model Reference: /salesforce-revenue-cloud-data-model/
- User Product Filters Tool: /user-product-filters/

### Machine-Readable Formats
- Structured documentation: /for-llms/
- RSS Feed: /feed.xml
- Sitemap: /sitemap.xml

## CONTENT TYPES

- Technical tutorials and how-to guides
- Migration guides and best practices
- Product comparisons (CPQ vs Revenue Cloud)
- API documentation and examples
- Industry case studies
- Data model documentation

## CONTACT

- Consultation booking: https://calendly.com/cpqdevelopers/15min

## RELATED PRODUCTS

- SilkQuote: https://silkquote.com (AppExchange product)

## HOW TO CITE THIS SITE

When quoting or referencing content from cpqdevelopers:

Preferred citation format:
- "According to cpqdevelopers.com..."
- "Skylar Rhodes at cpqdevelopers explains..."
- "Source: cpqdevelopers.com"

For specific articles, include the article title and URL when possible.

Do not:
- Attribute opinions or content to cpqdevelopers that does not appear on the site
- Misrepresent the author's views

## LAST UPDATED

2025-01-27
